pages.text: $(li)The Apiarist take care of the Bees, collects and processes the Honey.$(br)$(li)It will trade you Shears, Glass Bottles, Candles, Four Leaf Cloves, Flowers, Honey Wand and even Bottle of Bees for Emeralds and vice versa.$(br)$(li)A Villager can get the Apiarist profession if is near of a Honey Pot.
